title: Pherbomones
description: As a joke, Emma tries an herbal love potion from a new age shop. The joke is on her -- it seems to work, but on the wrong man! After a company party, she wakes up in bed with her workaholic boss. By the time Emma realizes that Bradley was the right one all along, it looks like he's lost interest. What's a girl to do?
author: Brooklyn Reede
